::DarkMouse::

She gets hit by the cannon and blown out of the hole she made in the 
hatch and lays on the ground ourside the ship. She lays there a 
moment and slowly gets up on all fours. Damaged, fluid leaking out of 
several gashes on her sides from the force of the cannon.  She felt 
woozy and a little disoriented, she looked around for Quickstrike.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>     As Darkmouse and Quickstrike gnaw through the door, the nerve 
gas is 
> released and the canons open fire on them. In the control room 
Black Aracnia 
> laughs and watches on a monitor.
